summary: The bill, titled the "Fairness for Servicemembers and their Families Act of 2025," mandates the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to periodically review the automatic maximum coverage under the Servicemembers' Group Life Insurance program and the Veterans' Group Life Insurance program. This review, conducted every five years, will compare the current coverage amount to a value adjusted by the Consumer Price Index to ensure the coverage keeps pace with inflation. The results of the review will be submitted to the House and Senate Veterans' Affairs Committees.
